page.title: 11FISHING IN QUEENBOROUGH
page.content: My dad has got a fishing boat called Rebecca Rochester. We sometimes go to fish down by the{Ferry Bridge. One day I caught a flatfish and 11 eels altogether. Sometimes I sleep on the boat. The bed is like a long seat and we wrap up in blankets. We might cook the fish that we catch. I like fried eels but my dad takes sandwiches as well. The longest I've ever stayed out there is two nights. My dad goes out fishing about twice a week and nearly every weekend. He often takes other people out fishing because the boat is licenced to carry 10 people. Sometimes they just stay quite near to{Queenborough}but sometimes they go out by the forts in the{Thames Estuary.
